msgs.changeNickname:
Your name doesn't follow the **[Server]FirstName LastName** format.
Your role will not/cannot be updated when you're doing prog on this server if your nickname doesn't follow the rules as it also helps the Raid Leaders recognize you.
You can change your nickname as shown here: https://imgur.com/Qp1klAk
Then head to #❗read-me-first❗

**Fair Warning:** I will keep nagging until you change it :)
msgs.giveFFLogs: I don't detect any FFlogs in your message. Please provide them as they are the only proof accepted by the raid leaders.
msgs.askDate:
**Event Date:**

Must be in __"dd-MM-yyyy hh:mm"__ format.

**Ex:** "25-2-2021 19:00", "5-12-2021 9:15", etc. All in ST/UTC/GMT +0
I may be a bot but I also suck at timezones :P
msgs.askComp:
**Party Comp:**
Written in the following order => TANKS HEALERS RANGED MELEES CASTERS ANY

**Ex 1: ** 12 12 6 6 6 6 //Standard DRS
**Ex 2: ** 1 3 3 3 3 11 //Speedrun DRN
**Ex 3: ** 2 2 0 0 0 4 //Standard 8 Man Party
msgs.askReserves:
**Roles reserved for leaders:**

Must be one line with each role separated by a space.
**Roles:** tank, healer, melee, ranged, caster, dps.  [flex is written dps]

**Ex:** "healer", "healer tank tank"
msgs.askAllowedRoles:
**Roles allowed to register in the event: **

Must be in one line with each role separated by a comma
**Ex 1:** AT KNIGHTS //One role, Not Case Sensitive
**Ex 2:** at knights, at hot and cold //Multiple roles, Not Case Sensitive
msgs.demote:
Hello,

Following a recent run, we've reviewed your case and because of performance issues during the run, we've ultimately taken the decision to demote you from your current role and lower it to ${role}.

**Reason:**
${reason}

**Run's Log:** ${log}

This demotion is non-negotiable, you may move back up the ladder by joining the according prog/kill runs.
If you have any questions relating to the run, please contact the RL's who can provide you with Logs.
Apologies for any inconvenience caused,

CBR DRS Raid Leaders
